name: ROSA (DreamCartographer)
description:
There was once a girl named Rosa, and she lived in the Void. She and her sister spent their days leading heroes through a world of excitement and adventure.  But inside, Rosa was empty.  There was nothing that could fill her with a sense of purpose. Even now, she knows there never will be.

Because nothing exists. Nothing is real.

...Except for you.

Made in Twine for Narrative Driven Jam #2. Theme: "Unreliable narrator"

Click the sidebar on the left to adjust the in-game volume.

Note: If you're having trouble getting a good ending, read my comment here on how to do so. SPOILERS, obviously - read this only if you're really stuck.

Credits:
